title: [Self-directed] Social Education Innovation through Mobile Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Smartphone Usage Skills and Social Studies Learning Fundamentals
context.additional_context: Environment where learners use mobile devices in daily life but are novice in educational applications; classroom Wi-Fi and tablet support available

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five elements of the M-COPE framework (mobile functionality, conditions, outcomes, pedagogical approaches, ethics) to actual instructional design
Learners can plan and execute team-based field investigation and data collection projects using mobile devices (tablets)
Learners can identify ethical issues (e.g., privacy concerns) that may arise in mobile learning activity design and propose solutions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
